metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3328 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high.
metadata.Description: Race condition in snap-confine's must_mkdir_and_open_with_perms() The Qualys Research Team discovered that a race condition existed in the snapd snap-confine binary when preparing the private /tmp mount for a snap. A local attacker could possibly use this issue to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code.

notes.Note: alexmurray> vuln introduced as part of the fix for CVE-2021-44731 - as such affects upstream versions 2.54.3 to 2.57.5

criterions.comment: snapd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
